column4: got a quick question im using my tv as a monitor and the problem is that i can't see start menu and im just wondering how i can see everything\
do you know what resolution your tv is?
I would drop out of X and go to a terminal while hooked up to the tv and try X -configure
see what it puts in the x.org file it creates for you
just make sure you backup your current x.org file if you go with the one you generated
it will probe your system and create a x.org file for you
you can try with that one, but backup your /etc/X11/xorg.conf somewhere safe
then copy the one it made in your homedir into /etc/X11 and /etc/init.d/gdm restart (or whatever your wm is)
thats why I said logout of X :)
to get to a terminal outside of X11
